channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:28PM; 1426 S Armacost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qcivqQ; #Sawtelle; *Address Confirmed* The first arriving 18 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive fire attack, to confine and extinguish flames in one second floor unit at the rear of a two-story apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E237 E37 E59 RA59 T37; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:15PM; 1426 S Armacost Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qcivqQ; #Sawtelle; *Address Tentative*. Offensive fire attack on one second floor unit well involved at the rear of a two-story apartment building.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E237 E37 E59 RA59 T37; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Greater Alarm Fire; INC#0678; 12:50PM; 1709 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MzCqaK; #CentralAlameda; 48 LAFD Firefighters + responders from nearby LACoFD stations in Automatic Aid, took just 45 minutes in largely defensive firefighting operations, to access, confine and extinguish a 75' x 100' pile of metal debris and machinery ablaze at a metal recycling business in an industrial area. No evacuation. No injury. Firefighters will remain on scene this afternoon to overhaul the fire and complete extinguishment of smoldering debris. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E21 E210 E211 EM1 RA14 RA814 T10 T11 T9 + LACoFD AC6 BC13 E13 E164 E52 T164; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Fire; INC#0678; 12:05PM; 1709 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MzCqaK; #CentralAlameda; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on a 75' x 100' pile of metal recycling material and machinery in an industrial area. No structure threat. No evacuation. No injury. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E21 E210 E211 EM1 RA14 RA814 T10 T11 T9 + LACoFD in Automatic Aid.; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1316; 06:24PM; 540 N Madison Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OGIgJY; #EastHollywood; Vegetation next to a vacant one-story home on fire, threatening the structure. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines and extinguished the flames in less than 10 minutes, preventing any fire from getting inside the nearby house. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E235 E35 E52 E6 RA6 T35; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0743; 12:13PM; 99 Silver Spur Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IDGxBx; #BellCanyon; One patient (34-year-old male) was stranded in a remote area of Bell Canyon, reported to be "stuck in a cave" and unable to return to their vehicle on their own. LAFD Air Ops lowered one rescuer down to the location to enter the cave and make contact with the hiker. Due to their original location, a hoist rescue was initially not possible, however, the rescuer led the patient to higher ground out of the cave and LAFD Air Ops was able to hoist the patient from the remote location and returned them to their vehicle.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 AO2 BC17 E105 E305 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 RA106 RH114 T105; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1816; 12:17AM; 23720 W Hartland St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oAFXxn; #WestHills; Upon arrival, firefighters saw flames consuming an attached garage, and discovered the fire had already spread to the attic and living space of the home. It took 28 firefighters 31 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E105 E106 E305 E72 RA105 T105; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1816; 11:46PM; 23719 W Hartland St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3oAFXxn; #WestHills; One-story single-family home with attached garage on fire. Offensive mode.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E105 E106 E305 RA105 T105; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1471; 07:50PM; 6400 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ryCvQZ; #LakeBalboa; It took 51 firefighters 35 minutes to contain the flames, holding them to less than one acre. Crews will remain on scene to fortify perimeter containment lines and ensure all hot spots within the burn footprint have been eliminated. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC17 E239 E273 E288 E290 E39 E73 E81 E90 E93 EM15 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 T39 T73 T88 T90 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1471; 07:15PM; 6400 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ryCvQZ; #LakeBalboa; Approx 200’ x 200’ fire in light flashy fuel with no wind.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC17 E239 E273 E288 E290 E39 E73 E81 E90 E93 EM15 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 T39 T73 T88 T90 WT88; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange
